radiographic_examinations.findings: Small left and trace right pleural effusion; lung bases clear; smooth liver capsule with homogeneous parenchyma and no focal lesions; patent portal vein; no intra or extrahepatic biliary dilation; multiple stones in gallbladder with moderate wall edema, indicating acute cholecystitis; normal pancreas with a 6 mm well-circumscribed T2 hyperintense lesion likely representing a side branch IPMN; multiple simple cysts in kidneys; small T1 hyperintense, nonenhancing lipoma in duodenum; no mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy; no suspicious osseous lesions.
